messages.content: I would like to go to England

Fantastic choice! England is incredible for travelers. I need to know which part of England interests you most:

üèôÔ∏è **Focus on One City** (Perfect for a deeper experience):
‚Ä¢ **London** - The main hub with world-class attractions
‚Ä¢ **Bath** - Georgian architecture and Roman baths  
‚Ä¢ **York** - Medieval city with historic walls

üó∫Ô∏è **Multi-City Adventure** (See more of the country):
‚Ä¢ **Regional Tour**: 2-3 cities (perfect for 5-10 days)
‚Ä¢ **Grand Tour**: Experience England comprehensively (10+ days)

üèòÔ∏è **Charming Small Towns & Villages**:
‚Ä¢ **Cotswolds** - Honey-stone villages and countryside
‚Ä¢ **Lake District** - Traditional villages with stunning lakes
‚Ä¢ **Yorkshire Dales** - Historic market towns

Which approach sounds more appealing to you?
Perfect! A 7-day trip to England. What's your total budget?

I see you have a budget of 2500. Which currency is this in?
      
üí∞ **Common Options:**
‚Ä¢ **¬£** - British Pounds (GBP)
‚Ä¢ **$** - US Dollars (USD) 
‚Ä¢ **‚Ç¨** - Euros (EUR)
‚Ä¢ **Other** - Please specify

Just let me know which currency you meant!
Excellent! How many people will be traveling?
Great! 2 travelers for 7 days. Where will you be departing from? (City or airport)

conversationSummary:

- Destination interest: England
- Budget: GBP2500
